posts.post_title: NFS T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear SGC 3.5
posts.post_content: SGC 3.5 T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear.  Beautifully centered, very clean card. PayPal ff or cover fees, Venmo a option as well. Card will be overnighted. Signature required. Photos in post below, many references if needed. No longer available.
